wikipedia_page.main: Alex Gibson is an American music and sound editor, known for his work on films, Transformers, The Dark Knight Rises, Mad Max: Fury Road, Interstellar, Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation, Terminator Genisys, Justice League, Dunkirk, for which he won the Academy Award for Best Sound Editing at 90th Academy Awards.

link_mentions.page: Academy Award for Best Sound Editing

response: *Alex Gibson (sound editor), British music and sound editor, known for his work on films
